hackathon-description-text: CreatED is a 24 hour hardware hackathon coming to Edinburgh this April.
hackathon-eligibility: You need to be over the age of 18 to take part in this hackathon.
hackathon-requirements: Please submit as much information as you can about your hack as this will allow judges to remember your project better. Pictures are strongly recommended and videos would be cool!
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Appleton Tower, 11 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9LE, UK

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: This is a hardware hackathon, so using hardware is kinda important! You'll score points here for use of appropriate technical solutions and the complexity of the hardware challenges you tackled.
If your project was ambitious or difficult, then this will score you points here. This is about being judged on your project as opposed to your idea.
Is the project well put together? Have you taken time to test it? How easy is it for a new user to get started?
You'll score points here for doing something that's new. If the idea hasn't been done before then that makes a project cool and this will reward that.

hackathon-location-address: Appleton Tower, 11 Crichton St, Edinburgh EH8 9LE, UK
hackathon-description-header: The UK's first student-run hardware hackathon!
